name: Jean Trench
description: Stop Traffic and Stay warm this winter with a denim hooded trench coat from KU Kouture for Pearluxe. Pre-order yours today for $50. All sales are final so email pearluxe@gmail.com for any question. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery.

name: Brittni & Christina
description: Brittni comes in purple & red leaving a should out and a slit front bodice, while Christina gives you the best of half and half. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery. All sales are final.

name: Isabelle
description: Look gorgeous in this Sexy Lavender body con. Order right now as this dress goes fast. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery. This is one size fits all. All sales are final.

name: Heather
description: This sultry peach dress is perfect for a night out. The crossed back dress with ruffle at the bottom is sure to disappear quickly. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery. This Dress is one size fits all. All sales in final.

name: Tracy
description: This popular peplum would be great for the Holiday Season. Order now this item goes quickly. Please allow 7-14 business days to receive your order. All Sales are final.

name: Sarah
description: Order Sarah today! This sheer exposed dress is definitely in vogue. Order today. Item goes quickly. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery. All sales  are final.

name: Rachel
description: Turn heads in this sexy dress decorated with slits up the side and at the shoulder blades. This sexy, sultry dress is ready to order. Order today and allow 7-14 business days for delivery. This is one size fits all. All sales are final.

name: Kustom iPad & Tablet Cases
description: All models are available and fully customizable. The options are endless. Once your order is placed, please email pearluxe@gmail.com with your customization details so we can work together to bring your vision to life. All iPad & Tablet cases take approximately 2 weeks.

name: Kustom Macbook Case
description: All models are available and fully customizable. The options are endless. Once your order is placed, please email pearluxe@gmail.com with your customization details so we can work together to bring your vision to life. All MacBook cases take approximately 2 weeks.

name: Diamonds Are Forever
description: Diamonds are a girl's best friend and you'll be the envy of all of your girls with this fabulous case for your iPhone. They are available for the 4/4s and 5/5s.

name: Quilted iPad 2 Case
description: Add a touch of glam to your iPad with this luxury quilted case.

name: Bleach Burst. III
description:
We are pleased to announce the KU Kouture for Pearluxe Kollection.  KU Kouture is our line of customized vintage denim that is sure to make you stand out amongst the rest. The customization options are endless and can be made to match anything.

Feel free to check out our customized option if you see an item that you like but it is not currently available in you size.
NOTE: KU Kouture for Pearluxe denim sizing varies. Please note that we use true denim so it is imperative that you order your true size or a size larger. This is to ensure that you will have a fabulous fit. All sales are final so please be sure to carefully select your size.  If you have any questions, please email pearluxe@gmail.com and we will be more that happy to assist you in any way.

name: Custom Pearluxe Glam Case

Be unique and have a case personally customized for your phone or tablet. The sky is the limit! Please allow for variations in designs as each case is made to order. Feel free to email me at pearluxe@gmail.com to make your vision come to life. 

***Please note that since each case is fully customized it takes about 2-3  weeks for your case to be designed, made, and shipped.***
